ygData.subject: Re: [corpse retrieval]
ygData.msgSnippet: right click on the social buttons (/anon, /feedback, etc.) and change em how ya want. then move it over to your hotkeys. Morgul ... From: Steve Tountas
ygData.messageBody:
right click on the social buttons (/anon, /feedback, etc.) and change em how
ya want. then move it over to your hotkeys.
Morgul
----- Original Message -----
From: Steve Tountas <tountass@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 5:07 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] [corpse retrieval]


> From: Steve Tountas <tountass@...>
>
> This may sound stupid, but how can you make commands like /corpse or /loc
> into hotkeys? I have been trying to figure it out since I set up my keys,
> but haven't been able to do it. Any help would be appreciated, thanks.
>
> At 11:05 PM 5/11/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >Here is a handy tip for those of you who die in line of sight of KOS
NPC's.
> I >discovered this with my druid character who can cast camo. Get someone
> to cast >invis or camo on you. Make the /corpse command a hotkey. Get
near
> your corpse >and drag it along to a safe spot in the zone by contiually
> clicking the hotkey >with your mouse. Your invis will not wear off until
> you right click on your >corpse.
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Got an opinion?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Make it count! Sign up for the ONElist Weekly Survey now.

> -= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
